storyInfo: To find out the truth of how her daughter Suzuran got hurt, a former Famiglia Venezia assassin, Ingrid, accepts a request from a Signore dei Lupi to protect his Fang—an old tailor. The tailor's grandson unexpectedly witnesses a car accident while out on a delivery, and is abducted by Venezia mafiosi.

attributes.text: Every hunter runs into a wolf before they go into the wastes.

The wolf says: Mulberry wood makes sturdy bows, and stones can be sharpened into deadly blades; but you must shed the clothes on you to survive, for it is the only thing that does not belong in the barrens.
So the hunter who kept his long coat on... was caught by tree roots protruding into the corner of the coat, ensnared by vines so tightly he could not move until he heard the beasts encircling him.

Another hunter covered himself head-to-toe in armor... was washed away by the river current when the water rushed into the tiny gaps between the metal plates, dragged down into the mud on the riverbed.
Only one hunter took the wolf's advice, and received a gift from it. The wolf tore off its own pelt, and placed it on the hunter.
The fur fit him so well, as if he was born with it. It helped the hunter survive countless dangers unscathed.
The pelt was so smooth and clean. When the hunter left the wilderness, not a speck of blood could be found on it.
And the hunter never took it off—

attributes.content: <p=2>November 1st, 1100    8:10 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Even the hunter's descendants had a custom of wearing clothing so fitting yet comfortable... and slowly, it evolved into the suit you commonly see on Siracusans today.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: ...Nonno, you've been telling me this story from when I was a baby, and I still don't get it. I've grown up and you're still telling it.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Luchino, I'm nearly done with these two suits. We just need to sew on these buttons.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You accepted this order on your own accord, so we must be meticulous in our work, no matter who the client is.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Go fetch the buttons from the back. You won't miss them, they have the Saluzzo's emblem.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Shouldn't I first bring them to Signorina Lappland for a fitting, and then we adjust the clothes afterward? As you taught me—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: It's fine. That Saluzzo signorina doesn't need it, I'll decide if they need any alterations.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But she didn't request to skip the fitting...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I know what's on your mind, boy.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Sometimes our clients request complicated designs, sometimes they don't even have a picture of it in their head, but it's not our place to probe too much.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Remember, Luchino: Tailor de Montano did not gain our reputation purely from our precision tailoring.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: People and materials are the same—know them before making any move.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Go get those buttons. It's time to finish this order.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Oh... okay.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Luchino looks at the two beautiful sets of attire. They are completely different to any suit his grandfather has ever made.
A magnum opus to be sure, worthy of the 'Made by de Montano' labels. He just wishes to be a part of that.
Luchino subconsciously pats his pocket. Inside are a few buttons he privately made himself, also engraved with the Saluzzo emblem.
I'll get them at once, Nonno.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: ...*sigh*
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I kept you waiting outside for quite long, didn't I? Please come in.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You can't delay Signor Antonio's commission any longer, Umberto.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The old Don's about to arrive, if you start now you can still finish it in time before the Carnevale.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Push back your other commissions and come with me to Venezia Trucking. We won't take too much of your time.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: My current commission is also one I can't disappoint.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Nonno! I heard someone come in!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Umberto, you don't actually have to make those measurements yourself.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Wanna go meet a real somebody, ragazzo?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Huh? A—A somebody? Nonno, I—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Luchino, give me the buttons.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Y—Yes!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: The young tailor nervously looks at his nonno's face.
Not bad.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But not good enough for these two outfits, Luchino.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: B—But I compared them so many times! They're practically the same!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Once you sew enough buttons, you'll be able to tell if they'll fit or not just by touching them. Go fetch mine.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Here, here! All here!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I—I just wanted to help you out!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Umberto, I think you're being too hard on the kid, personally.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Keep practicing, Luchino.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Yes, practice. I'll be good and get back to it once I bring back your medicine!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Signore, surely you can tell this boy is too reckless.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: ...You amuse me, Umberto.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Apologies, but my recent Carnevale commissions leave me no time at all to go with you.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I promise you, I'll personally go over to apologize once I'm done here.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Of course, I'll pay for any subsequent expenses as well.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You really think Signor Antonio cares about all that? All I care about, is that I can enjoy the Carnevale in peace, Umberto—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Umberto de Montano. Figured you'd be here.
You shouldn't be here, Zaaro.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: You lost your Fang and this round, so you ought to return to the barrens and wait for the next round to begin.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: Calm down, Caesar.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: I know you have the best odds of being the alpha of this round, but there's no way I can just sit and wait.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: I smell a strong human scent on you. Have you already picked up a new toy?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: If you did, then why did you come find me? Were you hoping I console you, Zaaro?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: I'm fed up with how you deceive and trick your little pup, Grandma.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: I summoned you here to share an interesting secret—where the last unidentified Fang is hiding.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: You're out of the game, yet you still try to interfere?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: Outsiders make the most eager audience.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Caesar, the bloody stench beneath your merciful appearance and your thirst for victory... I've always been able to sniff them out despite your efforts.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Besides, I don't care if you're interested in my information or not. I'm merely relishing it.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Your pup has a keen sense of smell. A pity our unidentified Fang has spent decades cleaning the scent of wolf off himself.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Umberto de Montano. A pathetic tailor.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Zaaro, I guarantee you that when this round ends, you'll savor the pain of our bite.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: Caesar, your anger is delicious as ever.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I'm not even the first wolf to challenge our rules.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: A Vulpo? You a tourist? Sorry, Tailor de Montano's all stuffed up with orders right now, so commissions are closed.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You're the boss here?
attributes.name: Smiling Signora

attributes.content: Who cares if I am or not—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: He does not dare to finish his sentence.
Because he has just seen the blade in her hands.
Right. How long has it been since anyone in this city walked around freely with a weapon in their hand?
A smile remains on the woman's face, but he has a feeling: one more word from him and her blade will surely stab through his throat, even if they are in Nuova Volsinii right now.
*cough* Signora, this man is an employee of the Venezia Trucking.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Trucking? The famiglia sure has changed a lot since I left.
attributes.name: Smiling Signora

attributes.content: (A Vulpo... the scar on her face... this suit, and that blade—)
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: (The homicidal lunatic that defected and left the famiglia... but six years ago, didn't she already...?)
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: You should go, signore. Please send Signor Antonio my regards. Of course, my prior promise to you remains true.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Tch... You... I... cazzo.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: (Grazie, Umberto.)
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Signora Venezia, you don't seem to have changed much.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You know me?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Your photos were always on the newspapers. Dominated the headlines for a long time.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I thought you would have informed your family first about your return to Siracusa.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I left them many years ago—I came here looking for you.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Yet you're not here to kill me. There's a familiar scent on you.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Vargo?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Yes. He found me in Higashi through his connections, and we made a deal.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to have our conversation while you bask in the sun and roll around the red leaves?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: (Big yawn)
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: How else?
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: I wouldn't have bothered helping that wolf out if not for the tiny bit of friendship we have.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: So you want me to return to Siracusa... and act as a bodyguard for someone?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: To 'solve a problem'.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: Do that, and you'll know the truth you've been chasing after.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: Why you couldn't find the culprit who hurt your daughter despite all the heads you took, and who exactly that is.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: Are you serious? You're not making up an excuse to chase me away from this place?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Hah. Your choice to believe it or not.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: Other than him, I should be the only one in this entire shrine who doesn't hate you, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: You raid the place whenever you come in here just to see him, and that makes me quite happy. Life at the shrine would be so dull otherwise.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: To be honest, I kind of want to follow you back to Siracusa for a little walk.
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: You're talking about a deep swamp... Your stubbornness and hobby of rolling about in the grass won't like it there.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Tell him I'm going back.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Not telling him yourself?
attributes.name: Slackerly Beast Aristocrat

attributes.content: It's for Lisa, he'll understand.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: After I came back to Siracusa, I also met with the Signore dei Lupi. You, Umberto de Montano, I honestly could not have imagined he really chose someone like you if he hadn't stated your very name...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: A humble tailor like myself?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I don't know how Vargo described me to you, but we do subtly differ in our views on some matters.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You don't look so good, Umberto.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Vargo told me the wolves always choose humans with some sort of impressive talent, but your health is quite poor.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: That ragazzo who just left, he's your...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Luchino is a bright boy, but he just can't accept the fact that time is unbeatable.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I'm old, Ingrid. Simple as that.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Is Vargo well?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I can't tell with them... Did he not come to you?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: We haven't seen each other for many years, I thought he'd long abandoned me.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Maybe he just didn't want to taint you with his scent and risk putting you in danger. That's my guess.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: ...Is that so?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: To be honest, I've no interest in finding out what happened between you and Vargo.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I'm just here to solve a problem for you.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: He told me how to distinguish the other Fangs. I was thinking, why not take the first move and give them hell instead?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: What do you think?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It seems you can't refuse the conditions he gave you.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But this swamp is difficult to leave, once you make even just half a step into the mud.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Uh... I'll meet Signor Alberto soon. Should I explain the suit design in detail?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: —I can't, Nonno will get mad if he finds out.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: But if Signor Alberto asks me about it, surely I can't refuse to answer.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Becoming acquaintances with the don of Famiglia Saluzzo could be good for us...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I might even manage to get better medicine for Nonno. Or maybe I could even bring him to Columbia to see even better doctors.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Huff. Stop spiraling, Luchino.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: The address from Signorina Lappland... it was this way, if I'm not wrong—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Uh... A truck?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Why is it so fast?! It'll hit the—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Hey!!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Luchino hugs the intricate box containing the suits as he stands on the street corner, and witnesses the accident happen.
A truck fully loaded with goods suddenly crashes into a car that was just about to turn at the intersection.
Glass shards scatter all over, the vehicle frames wrecked out of shape. A tire pops out from the truck.
...H—Help... Help them out!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Merda, everyone's gone to the main street for the show...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Hey, just hold on in there! I'll get you out—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Um, what are these... hidden inside the tires?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Here, Gambino! The car we had our sights on!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: That was just a damn coffee break, what the... We're done for!
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We were unlucky enough getting assigned the dirty work, with none of the credit...
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: And now something just had to happen to the goods under our eyes—
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Much worse than that, I'm afraid. Look at the car that got hit. Look familiar to you?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Why do you even care who the hell got hit—
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Wait. That's. Leontuzzo's...
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I gotta say, what you said about going back to Lungmen wasn't so terrible after all.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Let's get outta here before the cops and boss find out. We'll slowly settle the accounts between us after we're back there.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: We toiled to get a sliver of hope here. There's no way we can just throw in the towel now, don't forget why we came here to Nuova Volsinii, why we joined Venezia Trucking!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: No Signora Sicilia, no Grey Hall, and no restrictions from the other famiglie.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Who knows, we might even manage to make up a famiglia of our own, Gambino.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: See the kid across the street with the box? He's the only witness—maybe he caught a glimpse of the goods stashed inside the truck too?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: ...I got you. Up to us to decide if he saw anything. You're such a scumbag, Capone.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Just trying to keep myself alive, and leave a good impression on the boss at the same time.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Let's go. Take him, and tell them we got the sole witness with us.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: And the goods...?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: That's for the recipient to think about. Don't forget, the boss stressed again and again we're just cover.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: As for Leontuzzo... Hmph, hope he's fine.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Andiamo. We gotta get that kid before someone else does.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Uh, you are here to help?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Over here, someone's still inside the car—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Lights out.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I'll carry him.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: The box he was carrying...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Take it with us. Don't leave any clues behind.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: You sure no one saw us?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Obviously. The first thing I did here was to survey the surrounding area.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: 'CLOSED'.
The cafe is quiet, save for the occasional electrical 'buzzing' from the shop sign at the entrance.
'Closed for three days. Customers new and old, do vote for my daughter Ophelia at the show contest—A week of free coffee for everyone if she wins the right to light up the parade cars on Carnevale!'
A smell. It's strong.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I know you ran in here.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Sparks fly when a passing arrow strikes the dagger in Projekt Red's hand, and the impact numbs her hand slightly.
Quick reflexes. No wonder I'm not done hunting yet!
But I've got you now—
Huh?
I caught you.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Ow! If you weren't a Fang, I wanted to invite you to the pack.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Too bad Agnese wouldn't agree.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Grandma is waiting for me. I must hunt you... and then the last one.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Huh? Having second thoughts?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: ...No. Not anymore. I don't want to let Kal'tsit down. Grandma even more.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Best not get too close to a hunter!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Lunacub turns around as she shoots an arrow, and quickly slams into a window, shattering it and escaping into the streets.
Don't move. I won't miss this time for sure.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I need to confirm one thing with you before I drag you back to Agnese—
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I see Vargo was telling me the truth.
The wolf pack is restless.
I spent quite the effort to find you two.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Though the rest will be simple to do.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You have a smell that Agnese hates, but you're not a Fang.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You know her, Projekt Red? Just show yourself, I won't shoot on sight.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: But her blade. Sharper than mine.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...For real?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: There's no telling who'll win like this.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I will reach her first.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The red figure dashes towards Ingrid, and Lunacub quickly turns to aim at the blade-wielding Vulpo.
Not before my arrow does.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Three shots, and I'll have her cornered.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Behind you.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Trying to distract me? Tsk.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I've handled tougher fights in Siracusa with many more people on the other end.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But I'm always the last one standing. No exceptions.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Three arrows lodge into her sword sheath.
Don't treat humans like beasts. Your hunting skills won't work on me.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You can certainly continue to try. Same goes for you, 'Projekt Red'.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: This is not over yet.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: My blade... not sharp enough...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You can't hide from me forever. I won't wait any longer for Vargo's answers.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Are the police here actually working? I should go.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The accident, the Fangs, and the Famiglia Venezia's shadow...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I see Siracusa is welcoming me back with even bigger surprises.
attributes.name: Ingrid
